title: Quest items/Achievement Diary
content:
Item Name Found In Quest Used In Quest Needed For Quest? Used For? Achievement Diary
Monkey greegree Monkey Madness I Recipe For Disaster, Achievement Diary Yes Quest Item, Achievement Diary Ardougne (Hard) - Have a monkeyminder put you in a monkey cage
Iban's staff Underground Pass Achievement Diary No Weapon, Achievement Diary Ardougne (Med) Equip Iban's Staff OR Upgrade Iban's Staff
Dramen staff Lost City Fairytale I, Fairytale II, Lunar Diplomacy, Achievement Diary Yes Quest Item/Fairy Ring Teleports, Achievement Diary Ardougne (Med) Teleport to BIS via Fairy Ring, Ardougne (Med) Teleport to AIR via Fairy Ring, Fremennik (Med) Teleport to CIP via Fairy Ring, Kandarin (Med) Teleport to ALS via Fairy Ring, Lumbridge & Draynor (Med) Teleport to DIS via Fairy Ring
Lunar staff Lunar Diplomacy Achievement Diary No Comsetic, Fairy Rings, Achievement Diary, ETC Ardougne (Med) Teleport to BIS via Fairy Ring, Ardougne (Med) Teleport to AIR via Fairy Ring, Fremennik (Med Teleport to CIP via Fairy Ring, Kandarin (Med) Teleport to ALS via Fairy Ring, Lumbridge & Draynor (Med) Teleport to DIS via Fairy Ring
Keris Contact! Achievement Diary No Weapon (Extra Kalphite Damage), Achievement Diary Desert (Hard) Defeat A Locus Rider With Keris
Blackjack The Feud Achievement Diary No Skilling, Achievement Diary Desert (Hard) Knock Out A Menaphite Thug
Camulet Enakhra's Lament Achievement Diary No Cosmetic/Teleport, Achievement Diary Desert (Med) Teleport To Enakhra's Temple
Blurite ore The Knight's Sword Achievement Diary No Achievement Diary Falador (Easy) Smith Blurite Limbs On Dorics Anvil
Dwarven helmet Grim Tales Achievement Diary No Achievement Diary/BIS Crush Helm Falador (Hard) Equip Helmet In Dwarven Mines
Initiate sallet Recruitment Drive Achievement Diary No Cosmetic/Armour, Achievement Diary Falador (Med) Wear full initiate & Pray At Altar of Guthix In Taverley
Pet rock The Fremennik Trials Achievement Diary No Cosmetic, Achievement Diary Fremennik (Med) Pick Up Your Pet Rock From Your POH Menagerie
Steel gauntlets Family Crest Achievement Diary No Skilling, Achievement Diary Kandarin (Elite) Fish & Cook 5 Sharks In Catherby Using Cooking Gauntlets
Glarial's amulet Waterfall Quest Roving Elves, Achievement Diary Yes Quest Item, Achievement Diary Kandarin (Med) Kill A Fire Giant In Waterfall
Karambwan vessel Tai Bwo Wannai Trio Achievement Diary No Skilling, Achievement Diary Karamja (Med) - Catch A Karambwan
Barrows gloves Recipe For Disaster Achievement Diary No BIS Gloves, Achievement Diary Lumbridge & Draynor (Hard) Buy Barrows Gloves
Brooch The Lost Tribe Achievement Diary No Can be traded for mining helmet, Achievement Diary Lumbridge & Draynor (Hard) Light Your Mining Helmet In Lumbridge Castle Basement
Holy wrench Rum Deal Achievement Diary No VERY Useful For Prayer Bonus, Achievement Diary Lumbridge & Draynor (Med) Purchase An Upgraded Device From Ava
Crystal-mine key Haunted Mine Achievement Diary No Access To The Mine, Achievement Diary Morytania (Hard) Mine Mithril Ore In The Abandoned Mine
Ammo mould Dwarf Cannon Achievement Diary No Skilling, Achievement Diary Morytania (Med) Craft Cannonballs at Port Phasmatys Furnace
Ectophial Ghosts Ahoy Achievement Diary No Teleport, Achievement Diary Morytania (Med) Teleport to Port Phasmatys
Ring of charos Creature of Fenkestrain Achievement Diary No Cheapens Various Travels, Achievement Diary Varrock (Med) (also need kitty) Select Kitty Colour
Kitten Gertrude's Cat Achievement Diary No Cosmet—Awww.., Achievement Diary Varrock (Med) (also need Ring of charos) Select Kitty Colour
Crystal bow/shield Roving Elves Achievement Diary No Armour/Weapon, Achievement Diary Western Provinces (Hard) Kill an Elf with a Crystal Bow
Ogre bellows Big Chompy Bird Hunting Recipe For Disaster, Mourning's End Part 1, Achievement Diary Yes Quest Item, Achievement Diary Western Provinces (Med) Claim A Chompy Bird Hat From Rantz After 125+ Kills, Western Provinces (Hard) Claim A Chompy Bird From Rantz After 300= Kills, Western Provinces (Elite) Claim A Chompy Bird From Rantz After 1000+ Kills
Ogre bow Big Chompy Bird Hunting Recipe For Disaster, Achievement Diary Yes Quest Item, Combat, Achievement Diary Western Provinces (Med) Claim A Chompy Bird Hat From Rantz After 125+ Kills, Western Provinces (Hard) Claim A Chompy Bird From Rantz After 300= Kills, Western Provinces (Elite) Claim A Chompy Bird From Rantz After 1000+ Kills
Crystal saw seed The Eyes of Glouphrie Achievement Diary No Crystal Bow/Shield, Achievement Diary Western Provinces (Med) Turn crystal saw seed into Crystal Saw
Ring of visibility Desert Treasure Shadow Dungeon Entry, Ghostly Robes Minigame, Shadow Sword Miniquest, Kandarin Hard Diary, Elite Clue Scroll Yes Quest/Minigame/Achievement Diary Kandarin (Hard) - Kill a Shadow Hound in the Shadow Dungeon
